page.title: 13Policing
page.content:
Coventry is divided into 46 areas for policing. There is a police sub-station in Willenhall Precinct but part of our area is controlled by the stations at Fletchampsted Highway and the main station at Little Park St.
Each sub-division has a staff of 1 Superintendant 2 Chief Inspectors 7 Inspectors 20 Sargeants 80 Constables 25 Female Staff
Stoney Stanton Road has the largest population to look after. Each beat Bobby is supported by C.I.D., Traffic, Panda and normal shift personnel. Others are used for drugs,road safety, missing persons, crime prevention and prosecution.
